intro: Pleurothyrium undulatum, commonly known as the wavy-leaf fern, is a tropical plant native to regions of South America. It belongs to the family Blechnaceae and is characterized by its delicate, undulating fronds. The plant typically grows in shaded, moist environments, such as forest understories.
